column3: Amazon Lex is a service for building conversational interfaces using voice and text

column2: Is Amazon Lex a managed service
column3: Amazon Lex is a completely managed service so you donâ€™t have to manage scaling of resources or maintenance of code.

column2: Is Amazon Lex a free service
column3: No, Amazon Lex is a paid service.

column2: Does Amazon Lex get more intelligent over time
column3: Yes. Amazon Lex uses deep learning to improve over time.

column2: Can I install Amazon Lex on my computer
column3: No, Amazon Lex is a completely managed service by AWS.
